item.title: Senior Accounts Assistant
item.dc:creator: tsiger
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis sollicitudin ante vitae nibh varius, vestibulum luctus purus dapibus. Aliquam erat volutpat. Ut nunc nisi, iaculis non pulvinar in, rutrum ac felis. Vivamus quam nisi, ornare interdum ligula vel, scelerisque luctus leo. Integer at nulla purus. Donec non arcu et nibh scelerisque fringilla. Nunc nec pulvinar justo. Mauris ut auctor velit, ut auctor orci. Suspendisse gravida metus vitae libero dignissim, faucibus tincidunt ipsum scelerisque. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XKu_SEDAykw Etiam eu justo id lorem egestas fermentum nec a arcu. Donec dictum at lectus nec molestie. Nulla laoreet in justo ac accumsan. Mauris nec enim purus.

Duties include but are not limited to:

  • Conducts field research through usability tests and face-to-face interviews; creates user personas and incorporates analytics into design decisions.
  • Keeps up-to-date on the latest user experience research, interface design innovations, and best practices.
  • Designs beautiful, intuitive, and functional user interfaces and interactions, designs individual components and page layouts, and ensures design meets Georgetowns visual identity guidelines.
  • Creates functional wireframes and prototypes using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Works with developers to translate interactive and database-driven interface concepts into functional designs.
  • Works collaboratively with other UIS Web Services staff, as well as with web and communications teams in the Office of the Vice President for Global Engagement and the Center for New Designs in Learning and Scholarship.

How to Join the Team:

Please submit anything that demonstrates the above skills and experience. Submit a resume only if you feel that you must. We would prefer a link to a portfolio, Github/Bitbucket account, and/or other public code repository. Please include desired hourly rate. No phone calls or recruiters, please.

Perks

Duties include but are not limited to:

  • Conducts field research through usability tests and face-to-face interviews; creates user personas and incorporates analytics into design decisions.
  • Keeps up-to-date on the latest user experience research, interface design innovations, and best practices.
  • Designs beautiful, intuitive, and functional user interfaces and interactions, designs individual components and page layouts, and ensures design meets Georgetowns visual identity guidelines.
  • Creates functional wireframes and prototypes using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Works with developers to translate interactive and database-driven interface concepts into functional designs.
  • Works collaboratively with other UIS Web Services staff, as well as with web and communications teams in the Office of the Vice President for Global Engagement and the Center for New Designs in Learning and Scholarship.

How to Join the Team:

Please submit anything that demonstrates the above skills and experience. Submit a resume only if you feel that you must. We would prefer a link to a portfolio, Github/Bitbucket account, and/or other public code repository. Please include desired hourly rate. No phone calls or recruiters, please.

Perks
